    Zedentary
    A sit/stand thing
    Attach a controller

    Use your phone to control your avatar. Pair your phone with the game by clicking the icon and scanning the QR code. Follow the prompts on your phone to train the app to detect your standing/sitting position. If you've used the app before, you can re-use a previous model.

    Modes

    You can use monitoring mode where your avatar simply reflects your current position by clicking the icon.

    You can use game mode to play a game where you try to close as many tickets as possible without dying by clicking the button. You can only make progress on tickets while sitting, but sitting will also reduce your life.
